name: UNC Dataverse
description: UNC Dataverse is a FAIR-aligned repository for archiving, sharing, and accessing research data of all kinds. Each dataverse within the larger repository contains a multitude of datasets, and each dataset contains descriptive metadata, data, and documentation. UNC Dataverse is hosted and managed by the Research Data Management Core, University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill.
owner_name: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
